::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus: We're just waiting on Guardia.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  Perseus watched as his two backup troopers arrived, Ravenchief and
 Guardia were standing ready.
 
 "Salveo here,  I'm ready," he said through the radio.  "I've geared up
 and I'm ready to complete the lockdown on your signal."
 
 "Understood, do a final scan and prepare to comense operation."
 responded Perseus.
 
 Lord Perseus noticed that Doc and Rodimus were already there waiting.
 He nodded in acknowledgment.
 
 "Is everybody ready?" he asked.
 
 On 3/18/07, Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
 > OOC: I think Doc and Rodimus responded. Not sure about the rest... Oh,
 > doesn't matter.
 >
 > BIC:
 >
 > Doc: Doc in position and waiting orders.
 >
 > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 > >
 > > OOC: Anyone?
 > >
 > > On 3/15/07, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 > > >
 > > > After they had geared up, Lord Perseus, Guardia, and Ravenchief
 > > > proceded to the lower exit.  The base was built with three levels in a
 > > > stepped design.  The lower entance logically was on the lowest level.
 > > >
 > > > The lower exit was a relatively small door located next to the holding
 > > > cells at the bottom of the stairs.   Normally this area wouls be open
 > > > to the cells and an large unused room but the partition doors were now
 > > > down, blocking all access to the area.
 > > >
 > > > "Roll call!  Who's here!" said Perseus into his radio, speaking loud
 > > > enough to be heard by those standing nearby.
 > > >
 > > > On 3/13/07, Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
 > > > > Doc: Salveo, link up to my comm system. Everyone, open your comm
 > links
 > > > > on my frequency so everything will be relayed to everyone in
 > real time.
 > > > >
 > > > > He took out a rifle from his back and extended it to twice its
 > length.
 > > > >
 > > > > Doc: It's time to show that brute who's in charge here!
 > > > >
 > > > > He went to team 2's rendez-vous point.
 > > > >
 > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 > > > > >
 > > > > > "All right, if there are no no more questions, let's move out.
 >  Team
 > > > > > three, go to your positions, teams one and two, meet me down
 > at the
 > > > > > exit
 > > > > > tunnel entrance in 10 cycles." he paused a minute then walked
 > out the
 > > > > > door toward the armory.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > Salveo began preparing the security systems.  "If  you need
 > help with
 > > > > > your radio, I can help.  Otherwise, go and gear up."
 > > > > >
 > > > > > Guardia and Ravenchief left the room, following Perseus.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > On 3/12/07, Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > > > > > Doc: Acknowledged. If you want my opinion, though, I'd think we
 > > > better
 > > > > > > get moving.
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > ***
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > Still reflecting, Dinobot was considering what to do. Of
 > course, he
 > > > > > > could remain true to his word... And yet, so much was at
 > stake. He
 > > > > > > remembered Optimus Primal. If those Maximals were anything
 > like him,
 > > > > > > they would try to parley first. He then thought of
 > Depthcharge and
 > > > > > > Rattrap. What to expect? Well, the first thing was surely not to
 > > > scare
 > > > > > > them... and seeing how people had fled when the alarm broke out,
 > > > that
 > > > > > > was a bad start.
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > OOC: Sorry, I made that last post without reading the
 > following
 > > > > three
 > > > > > > > responses.  I think it still fits.
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > "Well, as I said, the citizens have been evacuated; however
 > > > > other than
 > > > > > > > locking down the base, the tower, and the airport, we
 > really don't
 > > > > > > have any
 > > > > > > > means to contain him.  Besides that, we have no place to
 > put the
 > > > bot
 > > > > > > if we
 > > > > > > > do end up capturing it.  I think diplomacy or letting the Pred
 > > > > > > escape would
 > > > > > > > probably be our best options." he said.  "I would move
 > that minion
 > > > > > > back to
 > > > > > > > the CR or make a temporary holding facility, but I've
 > learned from
 > > > > > > > experience that hastily built jails are nothing but trouble."
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > He pushed a button on the holo table and brought up an
 > overhead
 > > > > map with
 > > > > > > > lists of the teams floating above.
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > Team One
 > > > > > > > Lord Perseus
 > > > > > > > Ravenchief
 > > > > > > > 2 Troopers
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > Team Two
 > > > > > > > Rodimus
 > > > > > > > Guardia
 > > > > > > > Doc (independent)
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > Team Three
 > > > > > > > Salveo
 > > > > > > > Kenzo
 > > > > > > > Nightlight
 > > > > > > > 4 Troopers
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > "I can get you access to the tower if you want to locate
 > > > there.  You
 > > > > > > should
 > > > > > > > be able to see everything from there and I think your
 > presence may
 > > > > > > give the
 > > > > > > > scientists there a feeling of security.  I want all
 > support to be
 > > > > > > directed
 > > > > > > > by Rodimus, but avoid violence if at all possible."
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > "The base team will be supported by our loyal troopers,
 > however
 > > > you
 > > > > > > may be
 > > > > > > > called upon to assist if for some reason the base comes under
 > > > fire."
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > "Teams 1 and 2 will leave via the tunnel down by the detention
 > > > > facility,
 > > > > > > > that way no one will see us leave the base and we can
 > leave the
 > > > > > > shields up.
 > > > > > > > We need to make sure no one sees us leave.
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > My team will proceed to the waterfront, and team 2 will
 > position
 > > > > > > themselves
 > > > > > > > so that they can cover us."
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > "When everyone is in position, I will attempt to make
 > contact with
 > > > > > > the bot.
 > > > > > > > If he chooses violence, he will need to get through all of us
 > > > before
 > > > > > > he gets
 > > > > > > > up the ramp into the city."
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > "And we all know the mission goals, we can change the
 > strategy as
 > > > > > > conditions
 > > > > > > > change.  Any questions?"
 > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > On 3/8/07, Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > >   Doc sat, but something made him uncomfortable.
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > Doc: Rodimus, shouldn't we lock down the city in case this
 > > > > Predacon
 > > > > > > > > decides to escape before we can deal with him?
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com <nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com>,
 > > > Richard
 > > > > > > Allen
 > > > > > > > > <roborick007@> wrote:
 > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > Rodimus nods to his recent new friend Doc.
 > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > Rodimus: Have a seat. We're waiting for some of the
 > others to
 > > > > > > arrive.
 > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote: Doc
 > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > entered clumsily.
 > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > Doc: So, when do we start?
 > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com <nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com>,
 > > > > Kraftlos
 > > > > > > > > <kraftlos@> wrote:
 > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > Lord Perseus entered the room, he nodded to Salveo
 > who was
 > > > > at his
 > > > > > > > > > station
 > > > > > > > > > > and then greeted Rodimus who was waiting for the
 > briefing to
 > > > > > > start.
 > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > "Alright, where's everyone else?" he asked, somewhat
 > > > annoyed.
 > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > Just then Ravenchief entered the room, he had been
 > delayed
 > > > by
 > > > > > > > > talking to
 > > > > > > > > > > Elita. A minute later Guardia entered.
 > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > "I'm ready. What do we have to do this time?" said
 > > > > Guardia, in a
 > > > > > > > > > somewhat
 > > > > > > > > > > tired voice.
 > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > "I understand. It doesn't seem like we've had any
 > time to
 > > > > rest.
 > > > > > > > > > It's just
 > > > > > > > > > > been one crazy senario after another." replied Salveo.
 > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > "Well, unfortunately I can't promise you that we'll have
 > > > > time to
 > > > > > > > > > rest. But
 > > > > > > > > > > I'll try to the best of my ability to get us some
 > time to
 > > > rest
 > > > > > > > > up." said
 > > > > > > > > > > Lord Perseus. "I will start the briefing when
 > everyone is
 > > > > here."
 > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > On 3/4/07, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > As Rodimus was waiting in the briefing room for
 > Perseus,
 > > > he
 > > > > > > got to
 > > > > > > > > > thinkng
 > > > > > > > > > > > about his family. He hadn't checked up on them in
 > a while.
 > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > Roddy opens a channel.
 > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > Rodimus(via comm): Nightlight, Elita, you copy? I just
 > > > > wanted to
 > > > > > > > > > check up
 > > > > > > > > > > > on you two. Make sure everything was ok.
 > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > *Kraftlos <kraftlos@>* wrote:
 > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > "Why don't you protect the base? We need all the
 > help we
 > > > > can..."
 > > > > > > > > > said
 > > > > > > > > > > > Ravenchief to Elita. After saying this, he looked
 > up to
 > > > > > > > > Nightlight,
 > > > > > > > > > > > realizing he probably shouldn't have put that idea in
 > > > > her mind.
 > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > "We'll need you're help to keep everyone safe.
 > Make sure
 > > > > you do
 > > > > > > > > > what your
 > > > > > > > > > > > mom tells you!" he said, then leaving down the hallway
 > > > > to the
 > > > > > > > > command
 > > > > > > > > > > > center.
 > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > On 2/27/07, xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@> wrote:
 > > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > > ELita:
 > > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > > "I want o go , Ravenchief, I'm brave enough also
 > I can
 > > > > > > scare off
 > > > > > > > > > > > > bots"begged teh girl
 > > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > > -- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
 > > > > > > <nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com><nbwrpg%40yahoogrou
 > > > > > > > > ps.com>, "Nic"
 > > > > > > > > > > > > <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > > > Doc kept on walking beside Perseus, clearly
 > intent on
 > > > > > > finally
 > > > > > > > > > joining
 > > > > > > > > > > > > > the action.
 > > > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > > > Doc: What do we know about that bot? If we can
 > get a
 > > > > > > tech scan
 > > > > > > > > > of him,
 > > > > > > > > > > > > > we could prepare our defenses better.
 > > > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > > >
 > > > > > > > > > > > >
